glorifa.description: A long flowing dress garbs her shapely body. She stands in front of the portal with a stern face. It looks like she isn't letting anyone through without her approval first.
glorifa.response: Welcome to our realm $player$, please have a look around these halls and absorb all of the knowledge you can. Behind me stands the portal to Antiqua, but you need to show me your beginner's ticket before I will let you through.
